text: The My Opera Community is a virtual community, which provides help and social networking services for people who use the Opera browser. == History == The My Opera Community started in August 2001 and was shut down after February 2014. It currently has over 16,000,000 members, who are from all over the world. == Sources == == Other websites == *The My Opera Community Website Category:Opera ASA Category:2001 establishments Category:2014 disestablishments
title: My Opera Community
